sources: This concordance was developed using the Census Bureau 2012 NAICS to ISIC, Rev.4, concordance available at: https://www.census.gov/naics/. More information on 2012 NAICS classification is available at: https://www.census.gov/naics/. More information on ISIC, Rev.4, is available at: https://unstats.un.org/unsd/classifications/Econ/Structure.Science and Engineering Indicators
